channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Weather tracker: Storm Leonardo continues to batter Europe and northern Africa
item.description: Spain and Portugal hit with torrential rain while flash floods in Morocco force more than 100,000 people to evacuate The Iberian peninsula has been pl...

item.title: US and Iran set for further talks in Oman amid Trump’s military threats – live
item.description: Senior officials meet for indirect talks, amid a crisis that has raised fears of a military action between Iran and the US Analysis: Iran is betting T...

item.title: Russia’s foreign minister claims Ukraine to blame for attempted assassination of top general – Europe live
item.description: Sergei Lavrov blames shooting of Vladimir Alekseyev on Ukraine but does not back up Kremlin claim with evidence Hundreds of protesters gathered in Mil...

item.title: Keir Starmer ‘needs a miracle’ to stay on as prime minister, says Labour MP amid Mandelson scandal - UK politics live
item.description: Pressure continues to build on Keir Starmer and his chief of staff Morgan McSweeney Analysis: How the Epstein scandal has shaken the British governmen...

item.title: Donald Trump prompts fury after posting racist video about Barack and Michelle Obama – US politics live
item.description: The US president posted a racist video on Truth Social that included disproven allegations about ballot-counting Hello and welcome to today’s live cov...

item.title: Sir Elton calls press intrusion into his baby son 'truly sickening'
item.description: The musician says his privacy was breached in relation to health issues and the birth of his son.

item.title: Russian general shot several times in Moscow
item.description: Lt Gen Vladimir Alexeyev is a senior figure in the main directorate of Russia's military general staff.

item.title: US and Iran talks begin as fears of direct conflict continue
item.description: The US has built up its military presence in the Middle East in response to Iran's violent crackdown on protests.

item.title: Head of firm founded by Mandelson to quit

item.title: Jeweller Pandora switching to platinum from silver as prices surge
item.description: The jeweller says it wants to reduce its exposure after the cost of the precious metal has risen.
